• How to donate

What is Take7?

Take7 is an initiative formed by a group of friends with a shared goal: to provide comfortable, practical clothing to
people experiencing hardship and/or homelessness in our communities.
We recognise that while food, showers and laundry services are often available through support networks, access to
clean, functional clothing can be limited. That’s where Take7 steps in.

What do we do?

Collect

People donate new or gently used clothing, shoes, and essentials.

Sort

Items are checked, cleaned, and organised into categories ready for use.

Transport

Our mobile wardrobe brings clothing directly to community service hubs.

Take 7

Each person chooses up to seven items with dignity and support.
We collect new or gently used, clean, functional clothing - items that may not be pristine but are still in really good
condition:
  • Free from stains or tears, have working zips and all buttons
  • Comfortable and seasonally appropriate (warm for winter, cool for summer).
  • Including shoes, hats, compact blankets, and sleeping bags.
  • We also will be providing new underwear and socks.
We then sort, hang, and transport these items using a small box truck directly to community service hubs - places
already offering maybe food, showers, or laundry, but lacking clothing support.
On ‘site’, individuals are invited on a one-to-one basis to take up to 7 items from our mobile wardrobe. It’s more than
just clothing - it’s a moment for Manaakitanga (respect, generosity and care) and a good k≈çrerorero (chat).

How can you help?

We rely on ongoing support to keep this initiative running. Here’s how you can get involved:

Donate financially

Give $7 to Take7 every 7 days (the cost of a weekly café coffee)!!
Actually, we will take any $$ donation, more or less than $7, on a more or less frequent basis than weekly!! We are
also thankful to be operating under the Windsor Park Baptist Church umbrella, who are generously managing our
donations and issuing annual tax receipts. If Windsor Park doesn’t already have your contact details, please send
them to accounts@windsorpark.org.nz so they know where to email your donation receipt.
Their bank details are:
Bank: BNZ
Account Number: 02-0120-0110554-001
Account Name: Windsor Park Baptist Church.
Please include as a Reference: Take7, and in Particulars: Your Name

Donate clothing

We're always in need of good condition, comfortable clothing (freshly washed please).
Email us at take7nz@gmail.com to find out our current needs and your nearest collection partner.
Email us
Let’s Make a Difference - Together
Thank you for your kindness and support. Every donation, every garment, and every act
of generosity brings warmth, dignity, and hope to someone in need.

If you have any questions, want to partner with us, or simply want to learn more, we’d love to hear from you.

Reach us at take7nz@gmail.com

The Take7 Team
